content: You made a great point about an employee making a comment about their job being depressing Donna-Luisa, that should be a red flag. I’m glad your daughter was able to talk to you and she made a choice to leave. It’s vital that employers create a healthy atmosphere and a trusting one as well. Employees can’t grow and they don’t even know who to turn to if the atmosphere is one of distrust. Thanks for your wonderful comment and sharing your daughter’s story!
